thread.title: Refs in replay center will make some rulings on NBA reviews

title: Refs in replay center will make some rulings on NBA reviews
text:
Published By: USATODAY.com: NBA - Today 
NBA says referees will staff replay center and make rulings on reviews in certain situations ...
